en: bitchat uses Bluetooth to create a secure mesh network for chatting with nearby users.
localized: bitchat 使用蓝牙创建安全的网状网络，与附近用户聊天。
comment: Permission description for Bluetooth access to create mesh network

en: bitchat uses Bluetooth to discover and connect with other bitchat users nearby.
localized: bitchat 使用蓝牙发现并连接附近的其他 bitchat 用户。
comment: Permission description for Bluetooth peripheral mode to be discoverable

en: Take photos or video to share in chat.
localized: Take photos or video to share in chat.
comment: Permission description for camera access to capture photos or video
Permission description for microphone access to record audio

en: Choose photos or videos to share.
localized: Choose photos or videos to share.
comment: Permission description for reading from the photo library

en: Save images or videos from chat to your library.
localized: Save images or videos from chat to your library.
comment: Permission description for adding/saving to the photo library

en: Show nearby channels and location-based features.
localized: Show nearby channels and location-based features.
comment: Permission description for using location while app is in use

en: Find and connect to devices on your local network.
localized: Find and connect to devices on your local network.
comment: Permission description for discovering and connecting on the local network
